resources.string: The DCE Desk app is here to help the college students through this app.\n We are Computer Science and Engineering students of 20th batch, and with this simple app, we are trying to solve everyday problems of the college, we hope to build a strong and efficient platform to connect and unite DCEians.
Thank you for your support and co-operation\n Jai Hind!
"Don't you know our college got it's own app, let's try this simple efficient solution to our everyday problem?\n Donload here."
